name: 🎀 Thank You 🎀 FREE BASE by Niina Xan
name_original: 🎀 Thank You 🎀 FREE BASE by Niina Xan
description:
THANK YOU F2U BASE | Base Gratuita Base for personal use and YCH's!

This is my small gift for all the people who has been supporting me for a lot of time...Specially for this two years of "Moving to Germany" and all the "Trouble in Germany" stuff You guys are always making my days better with your lovely messages and comments, with all the drawings that I got from amazing people when I felt sad and desesperated... You made my experience out of my country super bearable, a lot of kind people who commissioned me with 0 rush, people who LITERALLY told me that they can wait over a year to get their comms. I JUST. I DON'T HAVE ENOUGH WORDS TO THANK YOU FOR ALL THAT YOU DO FOR ME!!!

ILYSM and I hope you like this first free gift~

---SPANISH---- Base para uso personal y YCH's!

Este es mi pequeño regalo para todas las personas que me han estado apoyando durante estos tiempos... Especialmente por estos dos años de "Mudanza a Alemania" y todos los "Problemas en Alemania" Ustedes siempre me están alegrando los días con sus lindos mensajes y comentarios, con todos los dibujos que recibí de gente increíble cuando me sentía triste y desesperada... Hicisteis super llevadera mi experiencia fuera de mi país... Mucha gente amable que me comisionó con 0 prisas, personas que LITERALMENTE me dijeron que pueden esperar más de un año para recibir sus commissions. YO YA NO TENGO PALABRAS PARA AGRADECER TODO LO QUE HACEIS POR MI!!!

los tkm y espero que les guste este primer regalo de muchos mas como agradecimiento por ser unos trocitos de cielo, os adoro ~

RULES   
  •  You can edit the base.
  • Credit me if you use it.
  •  YOU ARE ALLOWED TO take YCH COMMISSIONS, Personal use and Adopts.
  • Commissions can have the price that you want ♥
  • Don't delete the watermark! Add yours too!
  •  You can NOT re-sell the base!
  • Have fun!

EXTRA INFO: If you take commissions with this base please credit me for the lineart

 You are not allowed to do extensions without my aproval.
